title: Nawaz, Shehbaz constitute Punjab, KP Parliamentary Boards: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 17 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Friday said Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) Quaid Nawaz Sharif and its President Shehbaz Sharif had constituted Parliamentary Boards for the upcoming provincial assemblies elections of Punjab and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
She, in a tweet, said the boards were formed to award party tickets to suitable candidates for contesting Punjab and KP general elections.
پاکستان مسلم لیگ (ن) کے قائد محمد نوازشریف پارلیمانی اورپاکستان مسلم لیگ (ن) کے صدر شہبازشریف نے پنجاب اور خیبرپختونخوا کے لئے پارلیمانی بورڈ تشکیل دے دئیے بورڈز تشکیل دے دئیے pic.twitter.com/pqISPOT9lu
The minister also shared notifications on her Twitter handle in this regard.
